course_name: The Fundamentals of Designing and Staffing Organisations
description: The aim of this course is to provide students with the fundamental mindset, critical thinking skills, and competencies associated with positive performance enhancing staffing practices and work design in a complex, dynamic world. This course provides essential learning for line managers, those who wish to pursue a career in Human Resource Management, and anyone who wants to know how to make their organisation world class in talent management and workplace integration and engagement.
